entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Nain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nain Airport 10:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
Temperature: -9.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 32 %
Dewpoint: -23.0°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 10 this evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 10 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
